explains: v. 拘留，扣押；耽搁，阻留

sentences.en: He caught her arm in a subconscious attempt to detain her.
sentences.cn: 他下意识地抓住了她的胳膊，试图留住她。

sentences.en: Millson stood up. "Thank you. We won't detain you any further, Mrs. Stebbing."
sentences.cn: 米尔森站起来。“谢谢您。我们不再耽搁您了，斯特宾太太。”

sentences.en: It is against the law to detain you against your will for any length of time.
sentences.cn: 违反你的意愿拘留你无论多久都是违法的。
